title: HOW TO FIX FLAT TIRES FOR 10 YEARS

tasks.task: Fixing a flat tire on an ATV or UTV.
subtasks: Open the garage to access tools and supplies.
Retrieve the multi-seal flat tire repair kit.
Check the valve stem and ensure it's near the top.
Remove the valve core using the provided tool.
Allow the tire to deflate completely.
Attach the repair kit pump to the valve stem.
Pump the repair fluid into the tire (32 ounces for a 27-inch tire or smaller).
Reinsert the valve core after fluid application.
Inflate the tire to the recommended pressure.
Check for even weight distribution (optional but recommended).
Test the repair the following day to ensure success.

tasks.task: Fixing a flat tire on an ATV or UTV using a multi-seal repair kit.
Applying a multi-seal flat tire repair kit to an ATV/UTV tire.
Fix an ATV/UTV flat tire using a sealant (multi-seal).
Replace a flat tire on an ATV/UTV using a multi-seal kit.
subtasks: Remove the valve core by inserting the provided tool into the valve stem and turning clockwise until removed.

tasks.task: Fix an ATV/UTV flat tire using a multi-seal kit.
MAINTASK: Fix an ATV/UTV flat tire using a multi-seal kit.
